title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 14, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 14, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's action between the Bills/Titans and the MLB Playoffs. Down 2-0, are the Dodgers in trouble? Are the Tennessee Titans a legitimate contender after their win against Buffalo? We're joined by ESPN's Dan Orlovsky, MLB Network's Harold Reynolds and Lakers Head Coach Frank Vogel. Plus, DP talks about how he handles receiving criticism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
